Package it.uninsubria.shared.rmi

Interface UserService

All Superinterfaces:
Remote
All Known Implementing Classes:
UserServiceImpl
public interface UserService extends Remote
Remote interface for user management operations in the Book Recommender system. Provides methods for user registration, authentication, profile management, and session handling via RMI (Remote Method Invocation).

This interface defines the contract for user-related operations that can be invoked remotely by client applications. All methods may throw RemoteException for communication-related issues.

Since:
1.0
Version:
1.0
Author:
Book Recommender Team

  • Method Details

    • registerUser

      boolean registerUser(User utente) throws RemoteException
      Registers a new user in the system.
      Parameters:
      utente - the user object containing registration information
      Returns:
      true if registration was successful, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs

    • authenticateUser

      String authenticateUser(String usernameOrEmail, String password) throws RemoteException
      Authenticates a user and returns a JWT token for session management.
      Parameters:
      usernameOrEmail - the username or email of the user
      password - the user's password
      Returns:
      a JWT token if authentication is successful, null otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs

    • validateSession

      boolean validateSession(String token) throws RemoteException
      Validates if a JWT session token is still active and valid.
      Parameters:
      token - the JWT token to validate
      Returns:
      true if the token is valid and not expired, false otherwise
      Throws:
      RemoteException - if a communication error occurs
